reviewText: I have a very curious question. Was this and the other VHS's like this unlicensed or were sold in libraries? I'm confused. Because I don't want to buy old VHS tapes like this with episodes from Batman: The Animated Series or Superman: The Animated Series anymore since I'm buying them on DVD nowadays.

In hard-shell case. Episodes:
1. Pretty Poison (9/14/92)
2. Two-face, Part 1 (9/25/92)
3. Two-face, Part 2 (9/28/92)
4. The Trial (5/16/94)
